name: firstRange(of:in:)
desc: Returns the first found range of the type’s data buffer.Required. Default implementation provided.

items.name: func firstRange<D, R>(of: D, in: R) -> Range<Self.Index>?
items.desc: Returns the first found range of the type’s data buffer.

declaration: func firstRange<D, R>(of: D, in: R) -> Range<Self.Index>? where D : DataProtocol, R : RangeExpression, Self.Index == R.Bound
